title: Come see this charming 2 Bed, 2.5 Bath today! Washer/dryer included!
posting_body: ['IMT Dayton Station - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 2.5', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1154 sq ft', 'Rent: $2410/Month', 'Terms: Variable', 'show contact info', '**Walk-ins welcome &
